# Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
  - Next.js application with Python backend integration
  - Mobile-first responsive design

- [x] Scaffold the Project
  - Created Next.js 15 app with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and App Router

- [x] Customize the Project
  - Added responsive mobile-first UI components
  - Configured Python backend proxy in next.config.ts
  - Created sample FastAPI backend with CORS configuration
  - Added backend connection test functionality

- [x] Install Required Extensions
  - No specific extensions required

- [x] Compile the Project
  - Dependencies installed successfully

- [x] Create and Run Task
  - Ready to run with npm run dev

- [ ] Launch the Project
  - Run: npm run dev (Frontend on port 3000)
  - Run: python backend/main.py (Backend on port 8000)

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
  - README.md updated with comprehensive setup instructions
  - Backend README.md created
  - .env.example added
